# API Design Document

This document outlines the API design for the application server.

## Endpoints

- `/api/v1/documents` - List documents
- `/api/v1/documents/{id}` - Get document details

- [x] Define API structure
- [ ] Implement authentication
- [ ] Add rate limiting
